InformationURL.Name: IAGA Guides and Standards
InformationURL.Description:
Overview of IAGA Guides and Standards which obtained within its
          Divisions and Working Groups. Information about observatories
          is maintained by the "Geomagntic Observatories" (V-OBS) working group.
